Class AdminSidebarController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.admin.AdminSidebarController
public class AdminSidebarController extends Object
Controller for managing the admin sidebar. Handles navigation to different admin pages.

    Method
    Description
    private void
    handleCancellations()
    Handles the "Cancellations" button click by switching to the admin cancellations view.

    Handles the "Logout" button click by loading the login view and logging the user out.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up user information and adding hover animations to the sidebar buttons.

    • setupSidebarHoverAnimation

      public static void setupSidebarHoverAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets up hover animations for the given sidebar button. The button will have a scaling and translation effect, along with a subtle shadow and background color change when hovered over.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to apply the hover animation to.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user for the sidebar and updates the user information displayed.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be set as the current user.

    • initializeUserInfo

      private void initializeUserInfo()
      Initializes and updates the user information (full name and role) displayed on the sidebar.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(AdminController controller)
      Sets the main controller for the admin sidebar, allowing the sidebar to switch content.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main controller of the admin dashboard.

    • handleMovies

      private void handleMovies()
      Handles the "Movies" button click by switching to the admin movies view.

    • handleSchedule

      private void handleSchedule()
      Handles the "Schedule" button click by switching to the admin schedule view.

    • handleCancellations

      private void handleCancellations()
      Handles the "Cancellations" button click by switching to the admin cancellations view.

    • handleLogout

      private void handleLogout()
      Handles the "Logout" button click by loading the login view and logging the user out.
